name: Abselite - A Platformer
description:
Welcome to Abselite, a 2D Platformer game created by Etao from Studio Ezorical. You will play as a adventuring squirrel searching for his acorn through out the breath-taking Ali Mountain. Your objective is simple, GET TO THE ACRONNN!

This game contains assets from places like OpenGameArt.Org, the Unity assets store et cetera. If owners aren't correctly credited, I apologies and will be more careful in my future projects.

More info is stated in the credits menu. When you finished the game.

- Etao
